local_intent: Confirm the milk_carton, then approach and align with 0.01 tolerance; verify target remains visible.
assumptions: Target is reachable on the tabletop
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: DetectObject with retry, ApproachAndAlign with tolerance=0.01 and timeout_ms=3000, then verify visibility. Push/Retreat/Wait are left to the parent tree.
